topic.title: Operative Note Surgical Procedure Section - conformance rules

lines.i: The Operative Note Surgical Procedure section can be used to restate the procedures performed if appropriate for an enterprise workflow. The procedure(s) performed associated with the Operative Note are formally modeled in the header using serviceEvent.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8034, CONF:10464 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.7.14"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15393)/@code="10223-6" Operative Note Surgical (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15394)
If the surgical procedure section is present there SHALL be text indicating the procedure performed. (CONF:8054)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15393)/@code="10223-6" Operative Note Surgical (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15394)
If the surgical procedure section is present there SHALL be text indicating the procedure performed. (CONF:8054)
